title: Subpart 8191-2 - Form And Manner Of Reporting Real Property Transfers
content:
Subpart 8191-2 - Form And Manner Of Reporting Real Property Transfers

State Regulations
§ 8191-2.1 - Form and manner of reporting real property transfers
§ 8191-2.2 - Alternative reporting procedure for transmittal of reports
§ 8191-2.3 - Corrections
§ 8191-2.4 - Additional information to be supplied by villages, the Cities of Glen Cove and Long Beach, and Nassau County
§ 8191-2.5 - Information to be supplied by New York City

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
